features: 【Replacement number】 Upgrade your samsung dishwasher with our reliable door gasket! The DD62-00043A gasket is compatible with several part numbers, including PD00023699, 2077491, AP4341785, PS4222432, and EAP4222432

【New Upgrade】Introducing the DD62-00043A dishwasher gasket，a must-have for any kitchen! It is 86.7 inches long and weighs 7.05 ounces. Made of brand new rubber material, it is more durable than other options available in the market, ensuring a longer service life. The dishwasher sink gasket is designed to solve the problem of dishwasher leaks and fits perfectly, so you can say goodbye to those pesky leaks and enjoy a hassle-free dishwashing experience.

【Easy Installatio】The installation process for the DD62-00043A dishwasher tub seal door gasket is simple and straightforward. First, remove the old gasket. Before installing the new gasket, leave a gap of about 2 inches below the channel and insert it with the lip facing inward. Press the gasket firmly to secure it in place. You can also refer to YouTube videos for additional guidance. It is a perfect fit that ensures a tight seal and prevents leaks.

【Compatibility Note】The DD62-00043A Dishwasher Front Tub Door Seal Gasket is compatible with multiple Samsung models,including DW80R5060US DW80J3020US DW80K7050US DMT800RHS DMT400RHW DMT300RFB DMT800RHB DMT800RHW DMR77LHW DW80K5050UG DMT400RHS DW80K7050US DW80F600UTS DMR78AHS DW80K5050US DMT800RW DW80J3020UB DW80K7050UG.To help you find the right information for your specific model, we have included a table below.

【Risk-Free Shopping】Shop with confidence knowing that our dishwasher gasket comes with a 3-year warranty. If you have any issues, feel free to contact us anytime for a refund, replacement, or 24-hour customer service. We are committed to providing you with hassle-free shopping and excellent after-sales support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The seller reached out to give me a peace of mind that it will fit my dishwasher. Very pleased with the service and the quality of the product. I had a hard time finding because I can't buy in any big box store and sampsung would have to special order for me which would cost me so much more. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to try to fix my dishwasher. It fit perfectly. It was cheaper than other options I researched and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stiffer than the original
reviews.reviewText: Is not as pliable as the original which caused the door to have a hard time staying closed. I did heat it up and taped the door shut for 24 hours to mold it into place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good customer service
reviews.reviewText: The vendor checked with me at purchase to verify the model number to make sure the seal would fit my Samsung. Unfortunately after installation the dishwasher door would not close due to improper fit. The vendor immediately refunded my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and Experience
reviews.reviewText: Product was a perfect fit. Installed in a couple minutes and no more leaks. They reached out before shipping for the dishwasher model number to ensure we were getting the correct fitting product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product and company
reviews.reviewText: Product was as described and was very easy to install.

reviews.reviewText: The rubber is soft, easy to install and fit well,
